Of course with that said I DON"T want you to turn me back to my original size like when I came to pick you up, alright?"

115121211.title: The Deserted Island

choices: "You wanna see if there's someplace to relax? This bit's getting kinda cramped!"
"Now that I'm the size of a house, you wanna see all this muscle put to use?"
1151212111.content:
"Wow." Parker breathed as he took in Rocket's near-flawless musculature. "You, uh, you look like you could put bodybuilders to shame." He mumbled out, as his blush deepened slightly at his admission of admiration of Rocket's body. Rocket's muzzle shifted into a cocky smirk as he raised a huge arm and flexed; the thick muscle swelling impressively, his chocolate brown fur distorting over the bulge of his bicep. "Oh yeah, and I feel like I could put bodybuilders to shame!" He chuckled before pausing. "So, you like that kid? You like the sight of me towering over you, with muscles that most people could only dream of?" He smirked, glancing down at his bulging 8-pack abdominals, the thick, tightly corded muscle set in a cobblestone-grid pattern.

Parker's blush deepened even further as he averted his gaze. He swallowed around a suddenly dry throat as he managed to croak out a response. "Uh, well, I mean, like..." He stammered out as Rocket's smug grin only widened. "Well, I suppose I have to admit that I am kind of jealous, yeah." He confessed, to which Rocket snickered before he threw back his head and let out a roar of laughter. The thunderous rumble of his deep bass easily rivaling the sound of a freight train as the sound waves buffeted against Parker's smaller frame, thanks to Rocket's substantially greater size and his much more powerful vocal cords. "Yeah, I thought so! I mean, who wouldn't? I'm huge!" He beamed down at him, his eyes seeming to almost sparkle with glee.

The colossal raccoon casually swaggered across the beach, his massive paws kicking up plumes of sand as he walked, his thick, bushy tail swaying above his firm, muscular rump. "Come on, kid, let's see if we can't find somewhere nice and spacious!" He chuckled with a sly, almost mischievous wink. Parker ran his tongue over his suddenly very dry lips that had nothing to do with the blazing tropical heat, following right behind him eagerly.

The two continued their stroll along the beach, Parker moving slightly to Rocket's side to avoid the kick-up of sand and huge pawprints left in the warm, gorgeously coloured sand by the 7-foot tall Racoon's passage. It looked as if it could have been off the cover of a travel brochure. "Alright, this spot looks roomy enough!" Rocket cheerfully proclaimed, linking his fingers together and raising his arms above his head as he stretched out his entire muscular body. His biceps swelled to the sizes of small watermelons, the thick, solid muscle bulging out impressively.

He brought his arms back down, stretching them out to the sides and flexing them again, letting out a surprisingly deep growl as he did so, drinking in the sight of just what his bigger body was capable of. With a chuckle, he dropped the pose, glancing down at his abs before looking over at Parker. He felt a rush of heat as Rocket grinned smugly at him. "I see someone's enjoying the show!" He laughed, leaning forward and bringing his arms forwards slightly as he tensed his stomach. His abdominal muscles flexed outwards, looking as though they were easily able to cut glass with the crevices seeming as though they were deep enough to hide quarters in. With a sly wink, he rose back up and turned around, so that his back was facing Parker. He raised his arms and flexed yet again, but this time, the focus was on his back, which rippled and shifted with bulging, powerful muscle. Parker swallowed around a sudden lump in his throat as Rocket squatted down, his big, bushy tail swayed around behind him as his massive rear flexed, his backside looking like it could probably have a quarter bounced off it.

The huge raccoon stood back up again, smoothly turning back around and stretching a leg out before him as he knelt down so that his left leg was extended out before him. With a grin he tensed his legs, leaving Parker to gape in awe as his calves bulged out until they looked like they could easily rival one of their namesakes in size. Parker was sure that there was no way he could possibly wrap both of his arms around that enormous limb and even with Rocket's greater size, while he knew he would be able to wrap his arms around it, he doubted that even Rocket himself would be able to wrap both of his huge hands around it. His gaze drifted lower to his thighs, which were just as impressive as his calves. Proportionately, they had grown as much as the rest of him, and even though they were still smaller than his calves, Parker held no delusions over just how strong Rocket's legs must be. Given that bigger animals need great muscular strength to reach the same speeds as smaller, leaner animals as told in Biology, he couldn't help but wonder if Rocket would be able to reach speeds rivaling those of other heroes, like Captain America.

However, Parker only had a few brief moments to dwell on that thought, as Rocket called out to him. "Hey, Parker! Get over here, I've got something very important to ask you." He smirked. Parker jumped at the sudden baritone of his voice, stumbling backward as he jolted. "Uh, sure thing!" He replied, rushing over to the giant Raccoon. "Uh, what's up?" He asked, grinning bashfully, to which Rocket's cocky smirk grew ever wider. "Well you see, kid, I like being this big!" He flashed a grin as he linked his fingers together and raised his arms above and behind his head and flexed. His huge pecs swelled outwards, the thick, tight muscles looking like two huge solid concrete slabs beneath the thick, rich brown fur. Parker swallowed again, barely resisting the urge to reach out and touch them. "But, I'm thinking, courtesy of you and your magic touch, I could get even bigger!" He grinned widely as his eyes seemed to almost flash with eager glee.

"Heh, uh, sure thing Rocket. I don't see why not. How big are you thinking?" Parker managed to get out despite his throat feeling as dry as the warm, soft sand he stood on. Rocket's eyes seemed to flash again as he grinned down at him. "20 feet." He said simply. Parker blinked at him. "20 feet?" He gasped out, eliciting a nod from the Raccoon. "Yeah, it's not too big, but it's almost three times as big as I am now! Can you believe that?" He grinned widely. Parker shook his head slowly. "No, I can't. I mean, I believe that it's three times bigger, but it's three times bigger! Man, it's only when you put it like that that it's really put into perspective. Man, that really makes me think about my power now that you mention it." He mused, looking at his hands before he was jolted out of his introspective state by Rocket's deep chuckles. "Well, speaking of your power, any chance you could use it on me?" He snickered as he lowered himself to the ground, bracing his arms against the warmth of the sand as he laid back casually. With a smooth wink, he raised his beefy left arm and gestured to his huge, powerful pectorals, inviting Parker to place his hands against Rocket's thick, soft fur and begin his growth anew.

Parker ran his tongue over his lips nervously as he approached Rocket, readying himself to make Rocket even bigger. Up to 20 feet tall, almost three times bigger in fact, as Rocket himself has so eagerly stated. He swallowed as he gently placed his hands atop his great, muscular chest before he took in a deep, steadying breath and allowed his power to flow. Immediately, Rocket's massive frame began to surge outwards, the great Raccoon letting out a gasp of pleasure as his body pushed outwards in every direction, pushing the surrounding sand into growing walls around the imprint of his tremendous and still-increasing weight. Parker let out a yelp as Rocket's flank smacked into his legs, knocking him onto Rocket's stunningly well-defined stomach. He let out an embarrassed smile as Rocket winked over at him smoothly, somehow able to pull it off despite the near overwhelming rush of growing. He let out a moan that Parker could have sworn dislodged a coconut from a nearby palm tree.

He didn't have time to think about it for long though, as Rocket let out a whine of delight as his height soared past 10 feet, rapidly smashing past 12 as his musculature continued to expand proudly, easily outclassing even the greatest of athletes. Parker had to admit the temptation to wonder if his musculature was reaching the level of The Incredible Hulk - from what he'd heard and seen, The Hulk was possibly one of, if not the, strongest being in the universe! Yet Rocket was still getting bigger and stronger, as he blew straight through 15 feet, his frame utterly dwarfing Parker, who now could comfortably fit onto his stomach lying stretched out and he was pretty sure that he could easily sit atop one of his pecs with plenty of room to spare, possibly even with enough room for another person. As he rushed past 18 feet, Parker turned to see his paws, which looked as though they could outsize SUVs with ease! He looked back at Rocket's face, which was contorted into an expression of pure, unadulterated pleasure. As he reached what had to be 20 feet, Parker finally broke off the growth. There was still no sign of his usual cockiness or smugness, only the thrill of growing bigger, stronger, tougher. More powerful.

Parker watched as Rocket took in great, heaving breaths, his muscular chest rising and falling with each gasp as he adjusted to his substantially greater size. After a few moments of catching his breath, the enormous Raccoon lifted his huge head and grinned down at the young man sprawled across his stomach. "Oh yeah kid, that's what I'm talking about!" He smirked cockily as he raised a massive, beefy arm and flexed, his eyes almost shining with glee at how utterly massive his bicep was now, no longer was it the size of a small watermelon. Now it was closer to the size of a large boulder. Rocket turned his gaze away from his bicep and back to Parker. "Hey, kid?" He asked.

Ha, you know, isn't it just the weirdest coincidence that you got the power to make people grow and it turns out that that's what you're into!" He chuckles, his mighty chest shaking so much that if Parker had been standing up he would have been thrown to his hands and knees. He looked up at the massive raccoon as a light blush crossed his face. Grinning sheepishly, he nodded slowly. "Yeah. Yeah, I guess it is a weird coincidence, isn't it? I mean, I didn't even really realise that this is what I was into until I met you, and now here I am!" He agreed. Leaning his head back, Rocket let out a contented sigh. "So, since you're so eager to see me get even bigger, you wanna get started?" He asked, to which Parker nodded in reply. "Yeah, of course!" He grinned widely, placing his hands atop Rocket's powerful chest and focusing his power.

Rocket let out a low, rumbling growl of pleasure as a soothing warmth spread throughout his body, radiating from Parker's touch. As the warmth spread, wherever it reached began to swell outwards, his already ludicrously powerful frame bulking up even further, long past the point where Rocket could have ever naturally achieved such a physique, even if he were somehow 20 feet tall already. As Rocket's towering frame began to stretch out further, his massive pectorals, already huge enough for Parker to comfortably sit on, stretched and swelled outwards to the point where Parker was reasonably confident that he could sit there and easily have room for another person to sit with him comfortably. His abdominals carved out a chiseled eight-pack, looking less like a complex, well-defined muscle structure and more like a set of cobblestones set out on a garden path. Parker swallowed thickly as he turned to see Rocket's face contort in joyful bliss as his height hit a whopping 25 feet and simply smashed straight on past without stopping.

His biceps promptly surged past the size of boulders, quickly bulging outwards until they had casually doubled in size. Rocket raised a massive arm and flexed it in clear view so that Parker could get a perfect, completely unobstructed view of the raccoon giant's equally giant bicep. "Hmph, not so big that you could get lost in there yet, but with your help, I just might get there!" He winked down at him which sent a thrill straight through him. He could just imagine falling into the crevices of his mighty abdominals, surrounded by powerful muscle as if it were a natural cave and not the abdomen of an impossibly huge raccoon. He lowered his head and sighed at the comfortable sensation of soft fur against his cheek, feeling the heat of Rocket's huge body radiating outwards and further providing a comforting suggestion.

Parker flinched as the sound of breaking wood sounded out as a tree toppled to the ground, unable to withstand the trembling of the ground from something as simple as Rocket's laughter. And, more importantly, if he was this powerful already, how powerful would he be when he got bigger?

The thought jerked him back to the fact that he had been growing Rocket before losing concentration. He quickly looked behind him to see a trench of sand that the huge paws which could easily crush SUVs beneath only a couple of toes had dug out with impressive ease. He let out a breath as he did a quick mental calculation. Jeez, Rocket must have been 30 feet tall at this point and judging from the slightly smug, very satisfied expression on his face, it was evident that Rocket knew that too. Parker shook his head. God, Rocket was bigger than a house at this stage! And it was all because of him! And... and... he liked it.

"Ya know, it's almost a shame we're out here on this island, alone, all by ourselves, with no trace of civilization around us! It means we don't got any buildings or stuff to measure how tall I am! I can't go parkin' my butt on the roof of a store or leaning on the roof o' some offices, so we gotta use our imagination, you know?" He smirked, wiggling his huge toes slightly. Parker swallowed as his throat went dry. He nodded dumbly as he stared at the thick digits as they wiggled teasingly. Parker's blush only intensified as Rocket's smug tone sounded out. "I'm sure you're not having any trouble with that though! Gotta be a good student to master your power so fast, so you're obviously one of the sharper tools in the box!" He said, evidently quite confident in his assessment. 131.content:
Parker was on his way back home from James's place. Parker and James had been friends for years, they had the same taste in girls. The same taste in movies, books, comedy. And just about everything.

They even shared another, less common taste. They both wanted to be fat. James was huge, tipping the scales at well over 500 pounds. But Parker had never been able to gain so much as an ounce. For a long time he was insanely jealous of James, and that feeling just got worse once his X-Gene had manifested.

Parker's mutant powers would seem worse than useless to most people. He could make people gain weight just by touching them. He couldn't make people lose weight, or gain muscle (though typically when he added fat to someone they also seemed to gain the strength to move easily with it). He could only make people fat. Which, on the whole, most would agree is fairly useless compared to many of the other mutant powers that are at large in the world right now. Though there is one other advantage to the weight Parker could add to people's frames, it would cause them no poor health. And that was it.

His powers didn't even work on himself either, so he couldn't just fatten his own body. Which brings us back to James. When Parker found out that James also wanted to be fat too he had kept his gift to himself at first. No one had found out about him yet, and he'd only ever used it on two occasions before that, both purely accidental.

But eventually, after a few months of trying fruitlessly to use his abilities on himself, he decided that fattening up his gainer friend was almost as good as getting fat himself. That was a year and a half ago, when James was just over 200 pounds. Chubby but not yet huge, with Parker's help however he was now nearing 600 pounds. Nearly a 400 pound gain in less than two years.

Parker put these thoughts out of his head as he trudged down the road toward his own house. He knew he wouldn't be able to keep using his powers on James for too much longer, his friend was already having some trouble walking. 'At least he probably won't get heart disease from the fat...' Parker thought.

When he was finally getting close to his house he felt a tremor run through the pavement. Followed by another and another, something very heavy was moving rapidly toward him. He turned as a shadow fell over him, and found himself looking at a very fleshy chest. He quickly canted his gaze upward and saw that the Blob was standing over him.

Parker was struck by uncertainty and staggered back a few steps. The Blob just laughed at his apparent fear.

"I know all about you, Parker." He thundered. "You're the mutant with the useless ability. Well, useless to most." The Blob added, smiling darkly.

"Wh-what do you mean?" Parker said taking a few more steps away.

The Blob closed the distance between them in one stride. "You can make people fatter, to most that would be useless at best, and an impediment at worst. But for me...more mass would make me stronger. The bigger I am the more powerful I become!" He shouted grandly. Stomping his foot on the ground and cracking the pavement for emphasis.

Parker stumbled backward and fell. The Blob loomed over him and rumbled. "Use your power on me, pipsqueak. Or I'll crush you."

Parker gulped, certain that he had no choice. Grimacing, and feeling loathsome for helping a villain, he reached up and grabbed a handful of the Blob's belly. The mutant's belly wobbled and started to expand.
